title: Feng Shui Step by Step : Arranging Your Home for Health and Happiness--with Personalized Astrological Charts
description: Simons, a feng shui master and astrologer, teaches readers how to feng shui their homes in a clear, step-by-step fashion and gives personalized advice based on readers' dates of birth. Simons presents not only the popular eight-point method but also divining techniques and other authentic Chinese methods that make analysis more complete. Illustrations.
author: T. Raphael Simons
